nodes.bodyText:
please guess what is missed over class and in code
Can we make instance of multliline regexp Check to catch that all Inputs has // config: and // ok or // violation ... all existing violations in code .... add to suppression with comment utill .... ?
https://checkstyle.org/config_regexp.html#RegexpMultiline
we can create third execution of checkstyle in config if that would help, as we need to focus on Input......java files in resource folder, or add wide suppression on all files that does not start with Input.
I am open to any hacky way, but I tired to remind this to all.

yes, and please exclude all Inputs from grammar folder, they will not have such comments.
But please beware that there might be no "// ok" and only // violation and vise versa.
